### Overview
VIA Rail Canada Inc. is seeking a service provider to provide translation services tailored to the needs of various departments within the company, including Human Resources, Marketing, Communication, Technical Services, Finance, etc.

### Tender Details

* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding.
* **Location**: Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

### Contact Information

* **Email**: [Jean-Louis_Derrey@viarail.ca](mailto:Jean-Louis_Derrey@viarail.ca)
* **Phone**: 514-871-6041

### Additional Information

* Bidding and documents are available on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

### Trade Agreements
The Government of Canada has concluded the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), which applies to this solicitation.

The procurement category for this solicitation is SRV (Services).
